text: Dilipkumar Viraji Thakor Dilipkumar Viraji Thakor (born 1 June 1959) is an Indian politician from the Patan District of Gujarat. He is currently Minister of Labour and Employment, Disaster Management, Devsthan, and Pilgrimage Development in the Government of GujaratGovernment of Gujarat website under the leadership of Chief Minister Vijay Rupani. He represents the Chanasma Constituency of Patan District in the Gujarat Legislative Assembly. ==Footnotes== Category:1959 births Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Gujarat Category:Gujarat MLAs 2012–2017 Category:Gujarat MLAs 2017– Category:Living people Category:People from Patan district Category:State cabinet ministers of Gujarat
title: Dilipkumar Viraji Thakor
